name: Click After Frames
description: Allows inputs to register after frames. Like mobile or bad mouse, but with more lag and no physics bugs.

soft-toggle.name: Disable CAF
soft-toggle.description: Disable CAF without needing to restart GD.

delay.name: Input Delay (ms)
delay.description: The delay each click takes in milliseconds.

random-toggle.name: Randomize Delay
random-toggle.description: Randomize delay between the two values after this

rand-min.name: Random Min (ms)
rand-min.description: The minimum random delay in milliseconds.

rand-max.name: Random Max (ms)
rand-max.description: The maxmimum random delay in milliseconds.
